ud3.3:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud3.3:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena yasojappamukhani pancamattani bhikkhusatani savatthim anuppattani honti bhagavantam dassanaya.
ud3.3:1.4: Tedha kho agantuka bhikkhu nevasikehi bhikkhuhi saddhim patisammodamana senasanani pannapayamana pattacivarani patisamayamana uccasadda mahasadda ahesum.
ud3.3:2.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
ud3.3:2.2: “ke panete, ananda, uccasadda mahasadda kevatta manne macchavilope”ti?
ud3.3:2.3: “Etani, bhante, yasojappamukhani pancamattani bhikkhusatani savatthim anuppattani bhagavantam dassanaya.
ud3.3:2.4: Tete agantuka bhikkhu nevasikehi bhikkhuhi saddhim patisammodamana senasanani pannapayamana pattacivarani patisamayamana uccasadda mahasadda”ti.
ud3.3:3.1: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato patissutva yena te bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva te bhikkhu etadavoca:
ud3.3:3.3: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato anandassa patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinne kho te bhikkhu bhagava etadavoca:
ud3.3:4.1: “Kim nu tumhe, bhikkhave, uccasadda mahasadda, kevatta manne macchavilope”ti?
ud3.3:4.2: Evam vutte, ayasma yasojo bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud3.3:4.3: “imani, bhante, pancamattani bhikkhusatani savatthim anuppattani bhagavantam dassanaya.
ud3.3:4.4: Teme agantuka bhikkhu nevasikehi bhikkhuhi saddhim patisammodamana senasanani pannapayamana pattacivarani patisamayamana uccasadda mahasadda”ti.
ud3.3:4.5: “Gacchatha, bhikkhave, panamemi vo; na vo mama santike vatthabban”ti.
ud3.3:5.1: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva senasanam samsametva pattacivaramadaya yena vajji tena carikam pakkamimsu.
ud3.3:5.2: Vajjisu anupubbena carikam caramana yena vaggumuda nadi tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva vaggumudaya nadiya tire pannakutiyo karitva vassam upagacchimsu.
ud3.3:6.1: Atha kho ayasma yasojo vassupagato bhikkhu amantesi:
ud3.3:6.2: “bhagavata mayam, avuso, panamita atthakamena hitesina, anukampakena anukampam upadaya.
ud3.3:6.3: Handa mayam, avuso, tatha viharam kappema yatha no viharatam bhagava attamano assa”ti.
ud3.3:6.4: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato yasojassa paccassosum.
ud3.3:6.5: Atha kho te bhikkhu vupakattha appamatta atapino pahitatta viharanta tenevantaravassena sabbeva tisso vijja sacchakamsu.
ud3.3:7.1: Atha kho bhagava savatthiyam yathabhirantam viharitva yena vesali tena carikam pakkami.
ud3.3:7.2: Anupubbena carikam caramano yena vesali tadavasari.
ud3.3:7.3: Tatra sudam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
ud3.3:8.1: Atha kho bhagava vaggumudatiriyanam bhikkhunam cetasa ceto paricca manasi karitva ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
ud3.3:8.2: “alokajata viya me, ananda, esa disa, obhasajata viya me, ananda, esa disa;
ud3.3:8.3: yassam disayam vaggumudatiriya bhikkhu viharanti gantum appatikulasi me manasi katum.
ud3.3:8.4: Pahineyyasi tvam, ananda, vaggumudatiriyanam bhikkhunam santike dutam:
ud3.3:9.1: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato patissutva yena annataro bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
ud3.3:9.2: “ehi tvam, avuso, yena vaggumudatiriya bhikkhu tenupasankama; upasankamitva vaggumudatiriye bhikkhu evam vadehi:
ud3.3:10.1: “Evamavuso”ti kho so bhikkhu ayasmato anandassa patissutva—
ud3.3:10.2: seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evamevam—mahavane kutagarasalayam antarahito vaggumudaya nadiya tire tesam bhikkhunam purato paturahosi.
ud3.3:10.3: Atha kho so bhikkhu vaggumudatiriye bhikkhu etadavoca:
ud3.3:11.1: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno patissutva senasanam samsametva pattacivaramadaya—
ud3.3:11.2: seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evamevam—vaggumudaya nadiya tire antarahita mahavane kutagarasalayam bhagavato sammukhe paturahesum.
ud3.3:11.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava anenjena samadhina nisinno hoti.
ud3.3:11.5: “katamena nu kho bhagava viharena etarahi viharati”ti?
ud3.3:12.1: Atha kho ayasma anando abhikkantaya rattiya, nikkhante pathame yame, utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud3.3:12.2: “abhikkanta, bhante, ratti; nikkhanto pathamo yamo; ciranisinna agantuka bhikkhu;
ud3.3:13.1: Dutiyampi kho ayasma anando abhikkantaya rattiya, nikkhante majjhime yame, utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud3.3:14.1: Tatiyampi kho ayasma anando abhikkantaya rattiya, nikkhante pacchime yame, uddhaste arune, nandimukhiya rattiya utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud3.3:15.1: Atha kho bhagava tamha samadhimha vutthahitva ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
ud3.3:15.2: “sace kho tvam, ananda, janeyyasi ettakampi te nappatibhaseyya.
ud3.3:15.3: Ahanca, ananda, imani ca panca bhikkhusatani sabbeva anenjasamadhina nisidimha”ti.
ud3.3:16.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
